name: Worst Nightmare
description:
The worst nightmare is the first person horror puzzle game. A game about reliving a nightmare.

The game begins with the player's car accident, after which he wakes up at the scene of the accident.
after that he sees the entrance to the cave he enters to take shelter, but after entering the entrance to the cave he collapses. Then you look for a way out of that cave, wandering through the cave you come across a broken wall leading to the entrance to the dungeon. Looking for a way out of the dungeon, you come across a monster that follows you all the way out of the dungeon and the castle. In front of the castle gates you come across a car that you escaping into the city and come to the hospital, and the sequel will find out by playing my game.
